resources.string: This app is intended to be used as an aid to study German spiritual vocabularies. Please refer to "Das Geheimnis des Menschlichen Lebens" for this quiz app.
Please use the diagram below for questions 3-7.
Please fill in the blank for the word \"Incarnation\" in German.
Please fill in the blank for the word \"Crucifixion\" in German.
Please fill in the blank for the word \"Resurrection\" in German.
Please fill in the blank for the word \"Ascension\" in German.
Please fill in the blank for the word \"Dispensing\" in German.
